ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Blade of Fiery Lamentations
ygData.msgSnippet: i think i have had the same experience.  i went from high 130s dex to under high 100s, so i lost about 30 points.  i don t know if i am missing more notes or
ygData.messageBody:
i think i have had the same experience. i went from high 130s dex to under
high 100s, so i lost about 30 points. i don't know if i am missing more
notes or if i am just imagining it. but i do often get pissed when i have
to hit a key 2 or 3 times to get a song going, that's when it is noticeable.

Shada Powa, L53 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> I cannot say that it is for sure, but when I moved from being
> a dex/chr
> bard to a more focussed AC bard, I noticed significant
> amounts of missed
> notes than before. Mind you when I gained 25 AC, I lost about 20-30
> points of Dex so the drop was pretty significant. Prior to
> the change I
> was in the area of about 140 dex and now I have 107.
>
> Trei
